title: Atlas URDF and SDF collision geometries vastly different

content.raw: As can be seen from the attached images, the collision geometry used in the SDF for Gazebo and the URDF for the robot_description are vastly different, with the Gazebo one looking reasonable while the URDF one could use some improvement. I expected to see this fixed at some point, but seeing the freeze approaching fast, I wonder if there are any plans to harmonize things?
